Scale - Class in capstone.gui
A class representation of a musical scale.

Creates a scale that starts at the specified root note, and is of the given type.
scale - Static variable in class capstone.gui.utils.SequencerUtils
The current scale
ScaleType - Enum in capstone.gui.enums
A representation of different musical scales.
selectedInstrument - Static variable in class capstone.gui.utils.SequencerUtils
The currently selected instrument

A graphical interface that represents a music sequencer.
